tool.name: map
tool.command:
soapdenovo2_map.py
## Inputs --contig=$contig --contigindex=$contigindex --soap_config=$soap_config
## Check if using default or custom parameters --default_full_settings_type=$default_full_settings.settings_type #if $default_full_settings.settings_type == "full" --ncpu=$default_full_settings.ncpu --output_gap_related_reads=$default_full_settings.output_gap_related_reads --kmer_r2c=$default_full_settings.kmer_r2c #end if
## Outputs --pegrads=$pegrads --read_on_contig=$read_on_contig --read_in_gap=$read_in_gap

param.name: settings_type
param.label: SOAPdenovo2 map settings to use
param.help: Default settings is suitable for most mapping needs. If you want full control, use Full parameter list

param.name: output_gap_related_reads
param.label: Output gap related reads in map step for using SRkgf to fill gap

param.name: kmer_r2c
param.label: kmer size to be used for mapping reads to contigs

tool.help:
**What it does**
SOAPdenovo2 is a short-read assembly method for building de novo draft assemblies of human-sized genomes. It is specially designed to assemble short reads from the Illumina Genome Analyzer (GA).
This Galaxy tool is a wrapping of the map operation in SOAPdenovo2. It analyses the outputs (out.contig and out.ContigIndex) created by the previous contig step to map the reads onto contigs.
-----
**Output files from Map**::
peGrads Information for each clone library: insert-size, read index upper bound, rank and pair number cutoff for a reliable link. This file can be revised manually for scaffolding tuning.
readOnContig Location of reads on contigs which are referred to by their edge index. Note that about half of the contigs are not listed in the contig file as their reverse-complementry counterparts are included already.
readInGap Contains reads that are located in gaps between contigs. This information is used to close gaps in scaffolds if the -F flag is set.
-----
**More information**
For test data and more detailed information, click here_.
.. _here: http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html
